original_title: NO change to export revenue conversion guidelines
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Central Bank of Sri Lanka emphasizes that the requirement to convert a part of the dollar income received by the exporters into Sri Lankan Rupees has not been suspended.
Accordingly, the exporters have to convert a part of their dollar income into theSri Lankan Rupees as per the existing guidelines.
However, the requirement to sell a part of the converted exporters' dollar income to the Central Bank of Sri Lanka by the licensed banks has been suspended since March 07, 2023.
